text: Hey folks! Playing with graphQL for blogs, and surprised not to find blog tags as a filter option for `post_collection`. Kind of a bummer, as it'd have a big impact on how my team does blogs right now - anyone have any workarounds they've tried?
<@UN0NUBU3S> Yes. source code editing. Thank you for the info.
no workarounds but it's definitely something I need as well. A few people have requested it and I believe it's on their "list" but not a quick update. <@U03U053QC72> <@UAYBXDG4U>
